WorkItem.Description:
In TFS_Branching_Guide_Scenarios_2010_Poster_v1.vsd I can see there are 4 scenarios under tab Scenarios.
The forth one is being called – Team, Feature, Release Isolation Branching Model.
 
However I cannot find this scenario in TFS_Branching_Guide_Scenarios_2010_v1.pdf. Only the first three are included in the pdf.
 
Do you plan to add this forth one to the pdf? I think it will be very valuable.
 
Issue submitted directly to Willy-Peter Schaub
WorkItem.Summary: Branching Poster Scenarios and the Branching Scenarios document don't align
